Package com.ephesoft.dcma.util.logger

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EphesoftLogger
    EphesoftLogger a wrapper of org.apache.log4j.Logger for logging info, errors and other logging level log.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EphesoftFileAppender
    This customised Log4j appender will separate the log messages based on message which is to be passed in logging event and will write them into both the identifier specific file and default file defined in log4j.xml.
    EphesoftLoggerConstants
    This is a constants file for Ephesoft logger.
    EphesoftLoggerFactory
    This class is parallel to org.apache.log4j.Logger.
    EphesoftLoggerImpl
    The EphesoftLoggerImpl is a utility class producing Loggers for various logging APIs for various logging levels.
    InstanceTypeLogRenderer
    This is a class that acts as a renderer for LogFileInstance as a string.
    LogFileInstance
    This is a custom class used for instance type logs.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InstanceType
    This enum is used for defining the instance type for which logging need to be done.
